title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
**Get Ready to Say Goodbye to Fly Infestations with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster!**

Are you tired of dealing with pesky fly infestations in your home, office, or industrial space? Do you want a reliable and effective solution to get rid of those unwanted buzzing pests? Look no further! Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster, the ultimate solution to your fly problems.

**What sets us apart:**

* **3 Packs, 30 Feet Each**: Our giant fly trap is designed to cover a massive area of 3600 square inches, ensuring that you have enough coverage for even the most severe infestations.
* **Pre-Baited and Ready to Use**: Our traps come pre-baited with a special scent attractant formula that lures flies in, making it easy to use and dispose of.
* **Indoor and Outdoor Use**: Whether you need to eliminate flies in your home, office, barn, or industrial space, our traps are designed to work effectively in both indoor and outdoor environments.
* **Non-Toxic and Disposable**: Our traps are made with non-toxic materials, ensuring safe use around pets and children. Plus, they're disposable, making cleanup a breeze.

**Effective in Any Condition:**

* **Damp Areas**: Our traps work effectively in damp areas where flies tend to thrive.
* **Humid Areas**: Our traps are designed to withstand humid conditions, ensuring maximum effectiveness.
* **Normal Conditions**: Our traps are perfect for everyday use in normal conditions.

**Intelligent Pest Management:**

Our Giant Fly Glue Trap is part of a larger approach to intelligent pest management, ensuring that you have a comprehensive solution to your fly problems.

**Don't Wait Any Longer!**

Order your Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and say goodbye to fly infestations for good!

Here's an attractive advertising description for the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster:

**Get Rid of Flies for Good with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster!**

Are you tired of dealing with pesky fly infestations in your home, business, or farm? Do you want a reliable and non-toxic solution to get rid of these unwanted pests? Look no further! Our Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is the ultimate solution for your fly problems.

**What sets us apart:**

* **Massive Coverage Area**: Our giant glue trap covers an impressive 3600 square inches, making it perfect for large areas or high-infestation zones.
* **Long-Lasting Effectiveness**: Our traps remain effective for up to one full year, ensuring you don't have to constantly replace them.
* **Ready to Use**: Each pack comes pre-baited and ready to use, saving you time and effort.
* **Indoor and Outdoor Use**: Our traps are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, making them perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms.
* **Non-Toxic and Safe**: Our glue traps are non-toxic and safe to use around people and pets, giving you peace of mind.
* **Intelligent Pest Management**: Our approach ensures a smart and effective way to manage fly infestations, reducing the risk of re-infestation.

**What you get:**

* 3 packs of 30 feet long glue traps
* Pre-baited and ready to use
* Scented with an attractive formula to lure flies
* Green color blends in with surroundings
* Disposable and easy to replace
* Perfect for high-infestation areas

**Don't let flies take over your space!** Order our Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and say goodbye to those pesky flies for good!

**Get Ready to Say Goodbye to Pesky Flies with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster!**

Are you tired of dealing with annoying flies ruining your peace and quiet? Do you want a reliable and effective solution to eliminate these unwanted pests from your home, office, or outdoor spaces? Look no further! Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster, the ultimate fly-catching solution that's easy to use, non-toxic, and disposable.

**What Sets Us Apart:**

* **Long-Lasting Performance**: Our traps are designed to last up to one full year, providing you with continuous protection against fly infestations.
* **Massive Coverage Area**: With 3600 square inches of adhesive surface, our traps can cover large areas, making them perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural settings.
* **Effective in Any Condition**: Our traps are specially designed to work in normal, damp, and humid areas, ensuring you're protected no matter the environment.
* **Scented Attractant Formula**: Our traps come with a unique scent that attracts flies, ensuring they get stuck and can't escape.
* **Intelligent Pest Management**: Our approach is designed to provide a comprehensive solution to fly infestations, ensuring you're not just treating the symptoms but also addressing the root cause.

**What You Get:**

* 3 packs of 30-foot long pre-baited traps, ready to use right out of the box
* Non-toxic and disposable design for easy cleanup and replacement
* Green color barn paper sheet material that blends in with any environment
* Suitable for use indoors and outdoors in residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural settings

**Order Now and Take Back Control of Your Space!**

Don't let flies ruin your day anymore. Get the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and enjoy a fly-free living and working space. Order now and take advantage of our competitive pricing and fast shipping!
